snippet: Spain will be the next casualty of the euro-zone crisis, unless Germany and its allies acknowledge that no country can pay off its debts by suffocating economic growth.
abstract: Editorial holds Spanish Prime Min Mariano Rajoy's proposed austerity budget contains damaging cuts that will worsen economic conditions in the country; warns Spain will become yet another casualty of the euro-zone crisis unless Germany and its allies acknowledge that no country can pay off its debts by suffocating economic growth.
lead_paragraph: Spain will be the next casualty of the euro-zone crisis, unless Germany and its allies acknowledge that no country can pay off its debts by suffocating economic growth.

headline.seo: An Overdose of Pain for Spain
